FetchEventClientId.summary:
The clientId read-only property of the
interface returns the id of the that the
current service worker is controlling.

remarks.para:
The method could then be passed this ID to retrieve the
associated client.

-Using Service Workers
-Service workers basic code example
-Is ServiceWorker ready?
-
-Using web workers

FetchEventClientId.value: A string that represents the client ID.
